    Test Page

    This is a intentionally simple test page. If you can see it at https://shinjh0849.github.io/test/ after pushing new changes, the deployment was successful.

    Checklist

    • ✅ Page renders with the Minimal Mistakes layout.
    • ✅ Navigation links update automatically thanks to _data/navigation.yml.
    • ✅ Markdown, tables, callouts, and code blocks are parsed correctly.

    Sample content

    Table

    Step Command
    Install dependencies bundle install
    Serve locally bundle exec jekyll serve
    Build for production JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build

    Code

    bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload

    Callout

    Everything below this line can be tweaked freely. Keep at least one unique sentence here so you can always confirm that the latest deployment is live.
